common.scan_code: Scan QR code to download DitchIt
common.subscribe_text: By subscribing, you will receive messages about our products, services and/or informational alerts. The frequency may vary. Message and data rates from your phone service may apply. You can unsubscribe from texting by replying “STOP”. You can always unsubscribe from emails by clicking an unsubscribe link.
common.no_posts_found: User has no posts to display
common.phone_validation: Please enter a valid phone number (e.g., 123-456-7890).
common.first_name_validation: First name must be at least 2 characters.
common.last_name_validation: Last name must be at least 2 characters.
common.no_available_text: Come back soon to discover new and exciting content!

error.inconvenience: We're sorry for the inconvenience. Please try again.
error.not_found_text: Looks like you've wandered off the map. This page doesn't exist or has been moved.

post.promote_text_2: and reach more potential buyers for
post.promote_text_3: Increase your chances of making a sale today!
post.no_posts: No posts here yet. Create your first one now!

chat.no_conversations_found: No chat conversations found. Start a conversation from any post to see your chats appear here.
chat.sure_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this chat room?

auth.phone_validation: Invalid phone number. Please enter a valid 10-digit US phone number, e.g., 123-456-7890

auth.enter_code_sent_to: Please enter the verification code sent to
auth.address_validation: Address must be at least 3 characters
auth.pass_confirm_length: Password confirmation must be at least 6 characters
auth.location_error: We could not determine your location. Default location is (United States)
auth.zipcode_error: No location found with this zip code

contact.message_validation: Message must be at least 10 characters long.

ditchNote.title: Introducing Ditchit - The Ultimate Local Marketplace!
ditchNote.point1: Buy, Sell, Ditchit - The Win-Win Marketplace.
ditchNote.point2: Ditchit offers a thrilling experience: list in 30 seconds, explore new arrivals daily, and connect with buyers and sellers in a secure community. Build your reputation, find hidden gems, and join millions of users shopping locally!
